targetLine.description: Replace renderAppsEditor function with new card-based implementation

description: Reimagine Applications tab from table-based to card-based grid layout with elegant hierarchy, modal editing instead of inline, and premium micro-interactions
rationale: Current table layout is cramped (11 columns), visually noisy, and difficult to manage. Card-based design provides superior visual hierarchy, better mobile responsiveness, and premium user experience. Modal editing eliminates visual clutter and creates focused interaction paradigm.
impact: Applications tab will have world-class visual design with clear information hierarchy, elegant animations, better space utilization, and focused editing experience
